    public class MrqSupportContentListFragment
extends ListFragment
implements MrqCommonContentListFragment

      • onActivityCreated

        public void onActivityCreated(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Description copied from interface: MrqCommonContentListFragment
        Called when the fragment's activity has been created. Creates a MrqContentListAdapter using MrqCommonContentListFragment.onCreateContentAdapter() and passes the result to MrqCommonContentListFragment.setListAdapter(ListAdapter). It initializes MrqContentListLoader by calling MrqCommonContentListFragment.onInitContentLoader();
        Specified by:
        onActivityCreated in interface MrqCommonContentListFragment
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - If the fragment is being re-created from a previous saved state, this is the state.

      • onInitContentLoader

        public void onInitContentLoader()
        Description copied from interface: MrqCommonContentListFragment
        Called by MrqCommonContentListFragment.onActivityCreated(Bundle) to initialize the MrqContentLoader. Calls LoaderManager.initLoader(int, Bundle, LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks) with id MrqCommonContentListFragment.MRQ_CONTENT_LOADER_ID and this as LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks.
        Specified by:
        onInitContentLoader in interface MrqCommonContentListFragment

      • onListItemClick

        public void onListItemClick(android.widget.ListView l,
                   android.view.View v,
                   int position,
                   long id)
        Description copied from interface: MrqCommonContentListFragment
        Called by ListView when content is clicked. Tracks a click by calling MrqSdk.trackContentClick(Context, MrqContent) Uses AdapterView.getItemAtPosition(int) to find MrqContent. Ignores items that are not MrqContent. Calls MrqCommonContentListFragment.onContentClick(ListView, MrqContentView) with the selected MrqContentView
        Specified by:
        onListItemClick in interface MrqCommonContentListFragment
        Parameters:
        l - The ListView where the click happened
        v - The view that was clicked within the ListView
        position - The position of the view in the list
        id - The row id of the item that was clicked

      • onContentClick

        public void onContentClick(android.widget.ListView l,
                  MrqContentView v)
        Description copied from interface: MrqCommonContentListFragment
        Called by MrqCommonContentListFragment.onListItemClick(ListView, View, int, long) when content is clicked. Loads MrqContent.getCreativeUrl() ()} in a browser. Uses MrqCommonContentListFragment.onListItemClick(ListView, View, int, long) to find MrqContent. Ignores items that are not MrqContent. Override this method to implement deep links.
        Specified by:
        onContentClick in interface MrqCommonContentListFragment
        Parameters:
        l - The ListView where the click happened
        v - The MrqContentView that was clicked within the ListView

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when id is not MrqCommonContentListFragment.MRQ_CONTENT_LOADER_ID.
